subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] my opinion on the mini box
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
--_e89b1617-3eb5-4e09-b0ba-894effcd568d_
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable


 I still say it's a mistake to beat the guy up. The fact is that it's maki=
ng more of this stuff available, and spreading the concept. Maybe someone l=
ike Sony will hear about and make a Ghost Walkman, which was like $500 buck=
s at first too., and all ya got was music!
 
 I may have to go to the Stanl=
ey, just to get a look this weekend.  I am within driving distance. 
 
 Fra=
nk-S


To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.comFrom: ghostchasingfool@...: Thu=
, 15 Nov 2007 12:47:47 -0800Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] my opinion on the mini b=
ox




Here, here Bruce.  I am glad others who a genuine support my outlook=
, I couldn't agree more!bhali333 <paranormalinvestigating@...> wrot=
e: 


since I dropped the bomb about this mini box to Frank s. yesterday I =
did not expect such a fervent hoopla about it.So I will give my box experie=
nced opinion after lengthy research with both Frank's and Joe's boxes. I ha=
ve contacted the manufacturer for an explanation, he instructed me to liste=
n to the audio file and view the demo video on his site. After doing so my =
opinion on this box and the builders intentions for it is.The box itself is=
 not a knock off of Frank's box but a cheap and ineffective version of Joe'=
s box,It works on an AM band instead of an FM band as Joe's box does. Anoth=
er big difference is Joe's box actually works and you have all heard the fi=
les I have posted from sessions with it. After listening to this box and se=
eing it in operation I feel that anyone who purchases this box will be very=
 disappointed and will not receive any contact from it and even if they did=
 they probably would not even realise it for the simple fact that you have =
to have a certain amount of experience with box research and operation befo=
re developing an ear for picking up real time communication and also creati=
ng a bond with the spirit friends on the other side and also a measure of t=
rust on both sides.I believe the manufacturer to be a capitalist and only i=
nterested in the monetary reward to be gained from offering this cheap and =
ineffective copy to unsuspecting and naive individuals who are interested i=
n this medium. I do not like to bad mouth anyone, it usually comes back to =
bite you in the ass but I believe that our friends on the other side know o=
f our intentions and would not allow someone with the wrong intentions to d=
evelop a working tool for communication. also I believe that a person does =
not pick the box the box picks the person. So let him have his short and lu=
crative run with this fooling unsuspecting clients, bad karma always comes =
home.Bruce
